content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.vw_D_RLS_User') )
    DROP VIEW dbo.vw_D_RLS_User
GO




CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_D_RLS_User]
AS

with cte_D_RLS_User (rls_userid, rls_name, rls_username)
as
(
SELECT              1,	'David Pope',	    'malutix@citytech.co.za'
union all SELECT    2,	'Mark Sterley',	    'marks@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    3,	'Kevin Munro',	    'kevinm@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    4,	'Sadie Campbell',	'sadiec@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    5,	'Bacchus Anthony',	'bacchusa@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    6,  'Mayur Govender',   'mayurg@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    7,  'Tashrin Sahadeo',  'tashrins@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    8,  'Anthony Naicker',  'anthony@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    9,  'Brian Venter',     'brianv@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    10, 'Riaan Snyman',     'riaans@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    11, 'Rodney Pillay',    'rodneyp@citylogistics.co.za'
union all SELECT    13, 'Ryan Gaines',      'ryang@citylogistics.co.za'




)

select * from cte_D_RLS_User;
